trans-unit.source: Azure RemoteApp licensing
trans-unit.target: Azure RemoteApp licensing

trans-unit.source: Learn how licensing works in Azure RemoteApp.
trans-unit.target: Learn how licensing works in Azure RemoteApp.

trans-unit.source: How does licensing work in Azure RemoteApp?
trans-unit.target: How does licensing work in Azure RemoteApp?

trans-unit.source: So you've set up your Azure RemoteApp service, created your templates, and are ready to publish apps to your users.
trans-unit.target: So you've set up your Azure RemoteApp service, created your templates, and are ready to publish apps to your users.

trans-unit.source: But there's still one last thing to figure out: licensing.
trans-unit.target: But there's still one last thing to figure out: licensing.

trans-unit.source: Just how does licensing work for RemoteApp and for the apps you share through RemoteApp?
trans-unit.target: Just how does licensing work for RemoteApp and for the apps you share through RemoteApp?

trans-unit.source: RemoteApp does not require any Windows licenses or Remote Desktop CALs.
trans-unit.target: RemoteApp does not require any Windows licenses or Remote Desktop CALs.

trans-unit.source: Your subscription takes care of the RemoteApp side itself.
trans-unit.target: Your subscription takes care of the RemoteApp side itself.

trans-unit.source: (Check out the details of the <link><linkText>pricing plans</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: (Check out the details of the <link><linkText>pricing plans</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: If you use one of the images that is included in your subscription, you can share any of the apps installed on that image without needing a separate license.
trans-unit.target: If you use one of the images that is included in your subscription, you can share any of the apps installed on that image without needing a separate license.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you use the Windows Server 2012 R2 template image to build your collection, you can share System Center Endpoint Protection with your users.
trans-unit.target: For example, if you use the Windows Server 2012 R2 template image to build your collection, you can share System Center Endpoint Protection with your users.

trans-unit.source: The only exceptions to this rule are Office 365 ProPlus, which requires a separate subscription, and Office 2013, which cannot be shared in a production collection.
trans-unit.target: The only exceptions to this rule are Office 365 ProPlus, which requires a separate subscription, and Office 2013, which cannot be shared in a production collection.

trans-unit.source: If you want to use the Office 365 template image that comes with RemoteApp, you must have an existing Office 365 ProPlus plan.
trans-unit.target: If you want to use the Office 365 template image that comes with RemoteApp, you must have an existing Office 365 ProPlus plan.

trans-unit.source: The same is true for any Office 365 app that you publish using a custom template.
trans-unit.target: The same is true for any Office 365 app that you publish using a custom template.

trans-unit.source: You need to activate the apps with your own subscription.
trans-unit.target: You need to activate the apps with your own subscription.

trans-unit.source: This is true for both trial and paid subscriptions.
trans-unit.target: This is true for both trial and paid subscriptions.

trans-unit.source: If you want to use the Office 365 template image during the trial, and you don't already have a subscription, go to the Office 365 page to sign up for a trial subscription.
trans-unit.target: If you want to use the Office 365 template image during the trial, and you don't already have a subscription, go to the Office 365 page to sign up for a trial subscription.

trans-unit.source: See <link><linkText>How do RemoteApp and Office work together?</linkText><title></title></link> for more information.
trans-unit.target: See <link><linkText>How do RemoteApp and Office work together?</linkText><title></title></link> for more information.

trans-unit.source: If, during the trial period, you don't want to get an Office 365 trial subscription, use the Office 2013 Professional Plus template image that comes with RemoteApp.
trans-unit.target: If, during the trial period, you don't want to get an Office 365 trial subscription, use the Office 2013 Professional Plus template image that comes with RemoteApp.

trans-unit.source: This template image can only be used for 30 days and cannot be converted into a paid collection.
trans-unit.target: This template image can only be used for 30 days and cannot be converted into a paid collection.

trans-unit.source: For other apps, you need to make sure that you have the license to share the app.
trans-unit.target: For other apps, you need to make sure that you have the license to share the app.

trans-unit.source: That makes sense, right?
trans-unit.target: That makes sense, right?

trans-unit.source: You can publish any app that you are legally entitled to share.
trans-unit.target: You can publish any app that you are legally entitled to share.

trans-unit.source: And you need to make sure you really are entitled to share your programs.
trans-unit.target: And you need to make sure you really are entitled to share your programs.

trans-unit.source: Please note that you cannot use a CAL or Volume License agreement in a cloud collection.
trans-unit.target: Please note that you cannot use a CAL or Volume License agreement in a cloud collection.

trans-unit.source: You can use a Volume License agreement to activate applications in your hybrid collection (except for Office).
trans-unit.target: You can use a Volume License agreement to activate applications in your hybrid collection (except for Office).

trans-unit.source: You just need to install them on your template image from the Volume License media.
trans-unit.target: You just need to install them on your template image from the Volume License media.

trans-unit.source: Follow the information from the application vendor to install licenses in a Remote Desktop environment.
trans-unit.target: Follow the information from the application vendor to install licenses in a Remote Desktop environment.
